message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'd like to try to get a better deal.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  While I'm confident in the $11,500 value, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10,750?
